title: vEru evarayum
sahitya:
vEru evarayum krpai kUruvAr enniDam vaDivElavA nIyum aDiyEnaik-kai viDil


anupallavi

  kAriruL pOlE shUzhum kavalaiyil vAzhum ennai pArttup-parivuDanE kAttiDa unnaiyanri


caraNam    cancala shuzhalilE sikkiyE tavikkum panjaiyEn konjam minjip-pizhaikkavE
tanjamenru unnai kenjuginra pOdu anjal enrE en nenjam kaLikkavE
